name: Antagonize
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The little guy had guts at least. You can see 'em right there between those cobbles."
—Glunk, freelance crusher

name: Attended Socialite
oracle_text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Attended Socialite gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Say hello to my little friend."

name: Backstreet Bruiser
oracle_text:
Defender
As long as there are two or more counters among creatures you control, Backstreet Bruiser can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: "I could show you what's in the case, but it'd be the last thing you ever see."

name: Backup Agent
oracle_text: When Backup Agent enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "My sources say the Beamtown Bullies were spotted in the Mezzio. Keep your eyes sharp and stay close to me."

name: Big Score
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "Unimaginable riches? I assure you, I have a *vivid* imagination."

name: Body Dropper
oracle_text:
Whenever you sacrifice another creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Body Dropper.
{B}{R}, Sacrifice another creature: Body Dropper gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: "Kill count? I lost track years ago."

name: Boon of Safety
oracle_text:
Put a shield counter on target creature. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
Scry 1.
flavor_text:
"Saving a stranger's life is an excellent recruitment method. Luckily, peril is so easy to come by."
—Falco Spara

name: Botanical Plaza
oracle_text:
Botanical Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
{2}{G}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Botanical Plaza: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Public parks are a favored meeting spot for those considering a shift in allegiance.

name: Broken Wings
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor_text: New Capenna's demonic masters are quick to extinguish any hint of the angels' power reawakening.

name: Brokers Hideout
oracle_text: When Brokers Hideout enters the battlefield, sacrifice it. When you do, search your library for a basic Forest, Plains, or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Once the witness was inside, the safe house vanished first from sight, then from memory.

name: Brokers Initiate
oracle_text: {4}{G/U}: Brokers Initiate has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Regarding the relative might of pen and sword, the official position of the Brokers is "Why choose?"

name: Brokers Veteran
oracle_text: When Brokers Veteran dies, put a shield counter on target creature you control. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
flavor_text: One last job before he retires.

name: Buy Your Silence
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Mikey "the Mouth" kept his nickname after he struck his deal with Gregorio, even though he never spoke another word.

name: Cabaretti Courtyard
oracle_text: When Cabaretti Courtyard enters the battlefield, sacrifice it. When you do, search your library for a basic Mountain, Forest, or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: So long as the Halo keeps flowing, the festivities never end.

name: Cabaretti Initiate
oracle_text: {2}{R/W}: Cabaretti Initiate gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Now there's a fellow who knows how to have a good time!"
—Jetmir

name: Caldaia Strongarm
oracle_text:
When Caldaia Strongarm enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Blitz {3}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Capenna Express
oracle_text:
Sacrifice a Treasure: Capenna Express becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Case the Joint
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then look at the top card of each player's library.
flavor_text: Steel doors and iron bars are child's play for an Obscura operative.

name: Celebrity Fencer
oracle_text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Celebrity Fencer.
flavor_text: After a brief but memorable incident at her first performance, she was never heckled again.

name: Celestial Regulator
oracle_text:
Flying
When Celestial Regulator enters the battlefield, choose target creature you don't control and tap it. If you control a creature with a counter on it, the chosen creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Chrome Cat
oracle_text: When Chrome Cat enters the battlefield, scry 1.
flavor_text:
"I always say, 'If it's breathing, it's lying.' Luckily my friend here does neither."
—Lord Xander

name: Civic Gardener
oracle_text: Whenever Civic Gardener attacks, untap target creature or land.
flavor_text: "I've told you knuckleheads a hundred times: You can kill 'em here, but bury the bodies somewhere else. If you disturb my prized azaleas again, you'd better dig a second hole for yourself!"

name: Civil Servant
oracle_text: Whenever Civil Servant attacks, you may tap another untapped Citizen you control. If you do, Civil Servant gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Together we can build a safer, brighter New Capenna!"

name: Corrupt Court Official
oracle_text: When Corrupt Court Official enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"I wouldn't call what they have here a justice system. More like an auction."
—Elspeth

name: Crooked Custodian
oracle_text: Crooked Custodian enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: "Nothing to see here. Just carrying a carpet. Yes, the carpet wears boots. Stop asking questions."

name: Cutthroat Contender
oracle_text: Pay 1 life: Cutthroat Contender gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: The fights may sometimes be rigged, but the front-row spectators know the wounds are real.

name: Dapper Shieldmate
oracle_text:
Dapper Shieldmate enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
As long as it's your turn, Dapper Shieldmate gets +2/+0.
flavor_text: Descended from Old Capenna's paladins, the Brokers are masters of defensive combat.

name: Daring Escape
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor_text: As the Adversary's forces descended upon the gala, Elspeth whispered to Giada, "I can get you out of here, but we have to go now."

name: Deal Gone Bad
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Feed the rumor mills with delicious treachery. Bad blood between those two is a good deal for us."
—Kamiz, Obscura Oculus

name: Demon's Due
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: Ob Nixilis extends his hand not in partnership, but to affirm your subservience.

name: Dig Up the Body
oracle_text:
Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.)
Mill two cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Disdainful Stroke
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"I've known for a year that you would cast this exact spell, at this exact spot, at this exact time."
—Raffine

name: Echo Inspector
oracle_text:
Flying
When Echo Inspector enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor_text: The rendezvous took place hours ago, but the Obscura agent read the residue with ease.

name: Exhibition Magician
oracle_text:
When Exhibition Magician enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
• Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Expendable Lackey
oracle_text: {1}{U}, Exile Expendable Lackey from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 blue Fish creature token with "This creature can't be blocked." Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text:
"Altonio? No, I'm sorry. No one by that name works here."
—Raffine

name: Extract the Truth
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a creature, enchantment, or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.
• Target opponent sacrifices an enchantment.

name: Fake Your Own Death
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control and you create a Treasure token." (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: For the Family
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control four or more creatures, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
flavor_text: The Cabaretti cultivate an image of harmless hedonism, happy for the other families to underestimate their formidable firepower.

name: Gathering Throng
oracle_text: When Gathering Throng enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Gathering Throng, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: A plus-one is simply not enough.

name: Gilded Pinions
oracle_text:
When Gilded Pinions enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Equipped creature has flying.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Girder Goons
oracle_text:
When Girder Goons dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Rogue creature token.
Blitz {3}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Glamorous Outlaw
oracle_text:
When Glamorous Outlaw enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you scry 2.
{2}, Exile Glamorous Outlaw from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}" until Glamorous Outlaw is cast from exile. You may cast Glamorous Outlaw for as long as it remains exiled.

name: Glittermonger
oracle_text: {T}: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Street corners in the Mezzio are a tantalizing bazaar of the fantastic, the illicit, and the fake.

name: Goldhound
oracle_text:
First strike
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{T}, Sacrifice Goldhound: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The staccato clatter of its metal claws on pavement is unmistakable.

name: Halo Scarab
oracle_text: {2}, Exile Halo Scarab from your graveyard: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: It pulses with the colors that best complement the wearer's outfit.

name: High-Rise Sawjack
oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever High-Rise Sawjack blocks a creature with flying, High-Rise Sawjack gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Slicing girders, rescuing trapped workers, killing gigantic rust flies—one tool does it all!

name: Hold for Ransom
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block and has "{7}: Hold for Ransom's controller sacrifices it and draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery."
flavor_text:
"Let's find out how much your friends think you're worth."
—Gino, hired kidnapper

name: Incriminate
oracle_text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. That player sacrifices one of them.
flavor_text:
"If I were you, I'd check that elf's coat. I saw him slipping something into his pocket just before you arrived."
—Krandal, freelance instigator

name: Inspiring Overseer
oracle_text:
Flying
When Inspiring Overseer enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text:
"This city could certainly use a bit more divine intervention."
—Inspector Jillard

name: Jackhammer
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"Subtlety is overrated."
—Mr. Orfeo, the Boulder

name: Jetmir's Fixer
oracle_text: {R}{G}: Jetmir's Fixer gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Jetmir's Fixer instead.
flavor_text: When you lose Jetmir's trust, his family makes sure you lose everything else.

name: Jewel Thief
oracle_text:
Vigilance, trample
When Jewel Thief enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "They can afford the loss. They build it into their prices."

name: Join the Maestros
oracle_text:
Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.)
Create a 4/3 black Ogre Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: "We're family now, big guy."

name: Kill Shot
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor_text:
"In the assassination trade, no one lives to make more than one mistake."
—Anhelo, the Painter

name: Light 'Em Up
oracle_text:
Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
Light 'Em Up deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

name: Maestros Initiate
oracle_text: {4}{U/R}, Exile Maestros Initiate from your graveyard: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
"How far are you willing to go for your family, cleanblade?"
—Lord Xander

name: Maestros Theater
oracle_text: When Maestros Theater enters the battlefield, sacrifice it. When you do, search your library for a basic Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Only extraordinary performers are invited to grace the grandest stage in New Capenna.

name: Majestic Metamorphosis
oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target artifact or creature becomes a 4/4 Angel artifact creature and gains flying.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: New Capenna's statues hold Old Capenna's secrets.

name: Make Disappear
oracle_text:
Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

name: Masked Bandits
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}, Exile Masked Bandits from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}" until Masked Bandits is cast from exile. You may cast Masked Bandits for as long as it remains exiled.

name: Mayhem Patrol
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Mayhem Patrol attacks, target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Blitz {1}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Midnight Assassin
oracle_text: Flying, deathtouch
flavor_text: The broad avenues and graceful spires of Park Heights are the playground of the affluent. After nightfall, they also make a fine hunting ground.

name: Most Wanted
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
When enchanted creature dies, create two Treasure tokens.
flavor_text: Overnight, Elspeth was branded the most dangerous criminal in New Capenna.

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Ob Nixilis decided the fastest way to seize control of New Capenna would be to usurp the networks of power already hidden there. Xander's Maestros were the first to fall.

name: Obscura Initiate
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{W/B}: Obscura Initiate gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: Obscura initiates are required to bring a gift of information. They are judged on both how useful it is and how hard it was to obtain.

name: Obscura Storefront
oracle_text: When Obscura Storefront enters the battlefield, sacrifice it. When you do, search your library for a basic Plains, Island, or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: In volatile times, a sense of certainty is in high demand.

name: Ominous Parcel
oracle_text:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Ominous Parcel: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Ominous Parcel: It deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: The rest of Anhelo's assistant arrived over the following week.

name: Paragon of Modernity
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}: Paragon of Modernity gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If exactly three colors of mana were spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.
flavor_text: No true angels have been created since the founding of New Capenna, but artisans have learned to craft elegant facsimiles.

name: Plasma Jockey
oracle_text:
Whenever Plasma Jockey attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
Blitz {2}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Prizefight
oracle_text:
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Underweight, underpaid, underestimated.

name: Psionic Snoop
oracle_text:
Flash
When Psionic Snoop enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor_text: She knows your next move before you do.

name: Quick-Draw Dagger
oracle_text:
Flash
When Quick-Draw Dagger enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control. That creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Racers' Ring
oracle_text:
Racers' Ring enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{2}{R}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Racers' Ring: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Purchasing chrome racehorses with cash is a common means of dispersing mysterious income.

name: Raffine's Guidance
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
You may cast Raffine's Guidance from your graveyard by paying {2}{W} rather than paying its mana cost.

name: Raffine's Informant
oracle_text: When Raffine's Informant enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor_text: "I've analyzed the vault schematic. Do you want the fast way, the easy way, or the secret way in?"

name: Rakish Revelers
oracle_text:
When Rakish Revelers enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
{2}, Exile Rakish Revelers from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}" until Rakish Revelers is cast from exile. You may cast Rakish Revelers for as long as it remains exiled.

name: Ready to Rumble
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Ready to Rumble deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"It's too quiet tonight. Go make trouble."
—Ziatora

name: Revelation of Power
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it has a counter on it, it also gains flying and lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: As Ob Nixilis closed in, Halo swept through Giada like an electrical current, and inside her, something long dormant unfurled its wings.

name: Revel Ruiner
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Revel Ruiner enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Rhox Pummeler
oracle_text:
Rhox Pummeler enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
Rhox Pummeler has trample as long as it has a shield counter on it.
flavor_text: When all you have is a warhammer, every face looks like a nail.

name: Riveteers Initiate
oracle_text: {1}{B/G}: Riveteers Initiate gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: Young viashino flock to the Riveteers for Ziatora's leadership, eager to unleash their own inner dragons.

name: Riveteers Overlook
oracle_text: When Riveteers Overlook enters the battlefield, sacrifice it. When you do, search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Along the outer girders, in gold filigree, are inscribed the names of all those who fell to their deaths during construction.

name: Rooftop Nuisance
oracle_text:
Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.

name: Run Out of Town
oracle_text: The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
flavor_text: Better to depart in haste than be dearly departed.

name: Security Bypass
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as enchanted creature is attacking alone, it can't be blocked.
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, it connives." (Its controller draws a card, then discards a card. If they discarded a nonland card, they put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Sewer Crocodile
oracle_text: {3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Quick, let's hide in the sewer!"
—Ginsi the Thief, now deceased

name: Shattered Seraph
oracle_text:
Flying
When Shattered Seraph enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

oracle_text:
Skybridge Towers enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{2}{W}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Skybridge Towers: Draw a card.
flavor_text: New Capenna's districts are a series of tiers; wealth and power always rise to the top.

name: Sky Crier
oracle_text:
Flying, lifelink
{3}{W}: You and target opponent each draw a card.
flavor_text: "Breaking news! Lord Xander found dead! Suspect at large!"

name: Snooping Newsie
oracle_text:
When Snooping Newsie enters the battlefield, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
As long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, Snooping Newsie gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

name: Social Climber
oracle_text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "It's all about who you know, darling. And now you're lucky enough to know me."

name: Spara's Adjudicators
oracle_text:
When Spara's Adjudicators enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls can't attack or block until your next turn.
{2}, Exile Spara's Adjudicators from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}" until Spara's Adjudicators is cast from exile. You may cast Spara's Adjudicators for as long as it remains exiled.

name: Speakeasy Server
oracle_text:
Flying
When Speakeasy Server enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each other creature you control.
flavor_text: "Whatever ails you, friends, this will cure it for tonight! And leave you with a little inspiration for tomorrow."

name: Sticky Fingers
oracle_text:
Enchant creature

When enchanted creature dies, draw a card.

name: Strangle

flavor_text: They'd warned him greed would be the death of him. He never thought to take it literally.

name: Tramway Station
oracle_text:
Tramway Station enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
{2}{B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Tramway Station: Draw a card.

name: Warm Welcome

flavor_text: "Welcome to the family. Chef Rocco sends their congratulations."

name: Waterfront District
oracle_text:
Waterfront District enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{2}{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Waterfront District: Draw a card.
flavor_text: The bottom of the dark canals is littered with countless corpses and treasures.

name: Witness Protection
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a green and white Citizen creature with base power and toughness 1/1 named Legitimate Businessperson. (It loses all other colors, card types, creature types, and names.)

name: Witty Roastmaster
oracle_text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Witty Roastmaster deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: If you're lucky, you'll walk out with just your ego singed.

name: Wrecking Crew
oracle_text: Reach, trample
flavor_text: They built the neighborhood. They know its weak points. They know all the hiding places. When they come for you, they'll find you and bring the roof down on your head.
